backend: This points to the GRPC-Web proxy, NOT the vanilla GRPC backend, e.g. http://localhost:8081

homeserver.url: The FULL homeserver URL, e.g. https://matrix.my-homeserver.com
homeserver.name: The homeserver name, like would be in the second half of a full username, e.g. my-homeserver.com
homeserver.riot: This is optional and would be the URL of a self-hosted Riot instance to sign in
